title: ThePirateWay.apk v 1.2
description:
Description
WARNING: You may not download copyrighted material with the help of The Pirate Way.
Fighting against internet censorship The Pirate Way offers proxy server lists for all major torrent sites.
Many countries have blocked access to sites like The Pirate Bay or Kickass Torrents. Exact copies of these are available on the internet but their numbers and/or locations change daily. We search the internet and bring them to you fresh in one aggregated form that is The Pirate Way. Simply select your favorite torrent site and choose a proxy server based on it's hosting country or ping and your browser will open it.
Currently supported torrent sites:
- ThePirateBay, 
- KickassTorrents, 
- isoHunt, 
- Movie2k, 
- Fenopy, 
- H33T
- Torrent Reactor.
For more information please visit http://thepirateway.ziggisoft.com.
To report a problem or to request new features, sites, proxies please use our contact form at http://thepirateway.ziggisoft.com/contact.php. We'll answer all requests by email or by app updates.
We are NOT affiliated with any of the above sites nor the ones available from within the app.


What's New
==== Version 1.2 ====
Bugfix.
==== Version 1.1 ====
Support for older devices.
==== Version 1.0 ====
Added Torrent Reactor proxies.
